column2: Using uncontrolled stored values in HTML allows for a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability.
column4: Stored cross-site scripting vulnerability due to [["stored value"|"relative:///lib/mini_profiler/profiler.rb:776:16:776:102"]].

column1: Dependency download using unencrypted communication channel
column2: Using unencrypted protocols to fetch dependencies can leave an application open to man-in-the-middle attacks.
column4: Dependency source URL uses the unencrypted protocol HTTP. Use HTTPS instead.
